name: survive the night (itch) (gitsch6)
description:
(this game is still being worked on till the end of the game jam)

you play as Rodolfo Gray, A man with schizophrenia and memory loss. He has to make sure everything is all locked and the lights are all off as he sees hallucinations. 

(disclaimer:  I do not fully understand everything about schizophrenia, although I did research on the topic. If I got anything wrong, please leave it in the comments.)

use w,a,s,d to move and click on doors to enter them.
